project.description: Utilizes the genomic managed input file to create index files for each study/consent pair marked as annotated and ready for processing and not yet processed/ingested. Studies must go through FULL PIPELINE including HPDS javabin generation before completing this step to ensure all consents are built correctly and merged

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
### assume etl role aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
mkdir data mkdir completed
aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} data/Managed_Inputs.csv aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/completed/GLOBAL_allConcepts.csv data/GLOBAL_allConcepts.csv
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
csvcut -c "Study Abbreviated Name","Study Identifier","Data Type","Data ready to process","Data processed" data/Managed_Inputs.csv > genomic_inputs.csv
IFS=',' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id data_type stdy_ready stdy_proc do if [[ ${data_type,,} == *"g"* ]]; then if [[ "${stdy_ready,,}" == "yes" ]]; then if [[ "${stdy_proc,,}" == "no" ]]; then aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "get-patient-mapping" > assume-role-output.txt export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
echo "$stdy_id ready to process, fetching subject and sample multi files and patient mapping" aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/rawData/ data/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*${stdy_id}*Sample.MULTI*" --include "*stdy_id*sample.MULTI*" aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/rawData/ data/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*${stdy_id}*Subject.MULTI*" --include "*stdy_id*subject.MULTI*"
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/data/${abv_name^^}_PatientMapping.v2.csv data/ unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN fi fi fi done < genomic_inputs.csv
java -jar jars/IndexFileGenerator.jar #aws s3 cp completed/ s3://avillach-biodatacatalyst-deployments-3drb48r/genomic-etl/ingestion-indexes/ --recursive --exclude "*.csv"
